rules.name: TRUE_Case_Open_Reminder_For_customer
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND NOT(3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6)
rules.label: TRUE Case Open Reminder For customer

decisions.name: Case_Open_Reminder_For_internal_pending_Decision
decisions.label: Case Open Reminder For Internal Pending Decision

rules.name: TRUE_Case_Open_Reminder_For_Internal_Pending
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND NOT(3 OR 4 OR 5) AND 6
rules.label: TRUE Case Open Reminder For Internal Pending

rules.name: TRUEReminderEmail1
rules.conditionLogic: 1 AND 2 AND NOT(3 OR 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7 OR 8 OR 9 OR 10 OR 11 OR 12 OR 13 OR 14 OR 15 OR 16 OR 17 )
rules.label: TRUE Reminder Email 1

Flow.description: Migrated from the Time Rule process using multiple criteria. Time rules available in desk.com

formulas.name: AssignedLabel
formulas.expression: IF( CONTAINS({!$Record.labels__c}, "Control4 Driver v120"), SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.labels__c}, "Control4 Driver v120", ""),{!$Record.labels__c})

formulas.name: FormulaFor30DayRMAPending
formulas.expression: IF(CONTAINS( {!$Record.labels__c},"30 Days RMA Pending"),SUBSTITUTE({!$Record.labels__c},"30 Days RMA Pending", "" ),{!$Record.labels__c})
